fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Croatia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mexico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Croatia have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.
Corner awarded to Croatia.
Croatia are coming forward and Ivan Perisic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Mexico at Arena Pernambuco.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Mexico.
Free kick Mexico.
Croatia have a goal kick.
Ivan Rakitic (Croatia) has received a yellow card from Ravshan Irmatov.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Croatia in their own half.
Attention is being given to Croatia’s Luka Modric and play has been suspended briefly.
The match in Recife is underway once more.
Luka Modric for Croatia is back on the field again.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Mexico a goal kick.
Throw-in Mexico.
Corner awarded to Croatia.
Croatia are pushing forward but Ivan Perisic's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Mexico goal kick.
Ball safe as Mexico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Mexico close to the penalty box.
Hector Herrera (Mexico) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Ball goes out of play for a Croatia goal kick.
Throw-in for Mexico in their own half.

Can Croatia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mexico's half?
Ravshan Irmatov awards Mexico a goal kick.
Throw-in for Croatia at Arena Pernambuco.
Can Croatia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Croatia throw-in in Mexico's half.
Mexico needs to be cautious. Croatia have an attacking throw-in.
Croatia push forward at Arena Pernambuco and Ivica Olic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Mexico defence.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Mexico territory.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a Croatia throw-in in Mexico's half.
Croatia have a goal kick.

Danijel Pranjic for Croatia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Mexico at Arena Pernambuco.
Can Croatia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Mexico needs to be cautious. Croatia have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Mexico goal kick.
In Recife Croatia attack through Ivan Perisic. The finish is off target, however.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Mexico.
Mexico's Jose Vazquez gets his shot away but it misses the target.

Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.

Corner awarded to Mexico.
Free kick Croatia.
Rafael Marquez (Mexico) has received a first yellow card.
Darijo Srna of Croatia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Mexico have a goal kick.
In Recife, Miguel Layun of Mexico is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Mexico.
Croatia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mexico to take a throw-in in Croatia territory.
Throw-in for Croatia in their own half.

Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Croatia.

2 minutes will be added to the first half in Recife.

Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov blows to end the first-half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Croatia.
Ivan Perisic (Croatia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Mexico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Croatia have been awarded a corner by Ravshan Irmatov.

Corner awarded to Mexico.
Mexico surge into the attack at Arena Pernambuco but Oribe Peralta’s header is off-target.
Ravshan Irmatov awards Croatia a goal kick.
Niko Kovac (Croatia) is making a first substitution, with Mateo Kovacic replacing Sime Vrsaljko.
Mexico awarded a free kick in their own half.

Javier Hernandez is replacing Giovani Dos Santos for Mexico at Arena Pernambuco.

Jose Vazquez (Mexico) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Mexico push forward through Paul Aguilar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Croatia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ravshan Irmatov signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.
Croatia make their second substitution with Ante Rebic replacing Ivica Olic.

Important block from the Croatia defence as Oribe Peralta fires in a strike for Mexico.
Hector Herrera instrumental with a fine assist.

Throw-in for Croatia close to the penalty box.

Niko Kovac is making the team's third substitution at Arena Pernambuco with Nikica Jelavic replacing Danijel Pranjic.

Great play from Oribe Peralta to set up the goal.

That's a fine assist from Rafael Marquez.

Ivan Perisic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Croatia.
Mario Mandzukic for Croatia is whistled offside.
